title: Captain C. A. Moonbloom
body: Captain C. A. Moonbloom spends the bulk of his days sailing the Sea of Bits, exploring the different islands that have never been explored, and documenting the stories he finds. He is always searching for a great new story to share with the world through the Bedtime Project. His favorite pastime is looking at clouds and finding fun shapes.

title: Captain Code
body: Captain Code is the director of the Library at Boolean and is the reason our stories make it into the world. He is constantly working on new projects to make the library even better. He enjoys chess, flying kites, and exploring the natural world. Especially waterfalls.
